bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me

Hi, I’m Durga Prasad—a final-year Computer Engineering student at Wadia College of Engineering, Pune. I’m passionate about software development and machine learning. I’ve worked on various projects based on Java Backend and Machine Coding, and even ranked 1st in the Tech Spark Coding Challenge.


With hands-on experience in Python, Java, C++, and web development, I’m currently diving deeper into backend and full-stack technologies. I enjoy solving problems, building useful tools, and continuously learning along the way. That's me!

education.title: education
education.description:
I completed my 10th and 12th from Kendriya Vidyalaya No. 2, passing out in 2020 with a strong academic record.

After that, I took a gap year to prepare for the JEE, which helped me build solid problem-solving and analytical skills.

Since 2021, I’ve been pursuing a B.E. in Computer Engineering at Wadia College of Engineering, Pune, with a current CGPA of 7.92/10.

Throughout my academic journey, I’ve worked on technical projects, participated in coding competitions, and completed internships that shaped my interests in software development, machine learning, and backend engineering.

These experiences have strengthened my technical base and helped me grow as a team player and communicator.

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.description:
Programming Languages: Java, C++, Python, SQL

Backend & Frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring Core, Spring Security, Hibernate, MVC Architecture, RESTful APIs

Frontend Technologies: HTML, Tailwind CSS, React.js

Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL

Cloud & DevOps: Amazon Web Services (AWS), Docker

Tools & Libraries: Maven, Kafka, GitHub, Postman

Data & AI Tools: TensorFlow, Keras, Pandas, NumPy, OpenAI API, Google Gemini API

Authentication & Security: JWT, Spring Security

Other Technical Skills: Kafka Messaging, Chrome Extension Integration, API Integration (OpenWeatherMap, NewsAPI), Data Visualization (Chart.js), Transfer Learning
